harkadventurer.control

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • harkadventurer.control.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    A GameController object manages the game. The GameController initialises the gamestate, and controls the flow of events throughout rounds of combat.
    Since:
    10/10/2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameController(UI inUI, FileLoader inLoader, ObjectIO inObjLoader)
      Constructs a GameController that uses the specified user interface, file loader and object loader.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadGame()
      Loads a list of teams from an object file, then begins a round.
      void playRound()
      Runs a round of combat.
      void saveGame()
      Saves the game's list of teams as an object file.
      void startGame()
      Begins a game using an Abilities and Character csv files.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController(UI inUI,
              FileLoader inLoader,
              ObjectIO inObjLoader)
        Constructs a GameController that uses the specified user interface, file loader and object loader.
        Parameters:
        inUI - The desired user interface
        inLoader - The FileLoader that will load Character and Ability files.
        inObjLoader - The ObjectIO object that will be used to save and load games in progress

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Begins a game using an Abilities and Character csv files. Uses the csv files to construct a list of teams, then, if the teams were loaded correctly, starts the game.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame()
        Saves the game's list of teams as an object file. Prompts the user to input a file name.

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame()
        Loads a list of teams from an object file, then begins a round.

      • playRound

        public void playRound()
        Runs a round of combat. Iterates through each team, taking a turn for each character. At the end of each turn, empty teams are removed from the team list. If there is only one team remaining at the end of the round, the game ends.
